name: Alchemical Familiar
desc: You have used alchemy to create life, a simple creature formed from alchemical materials, reagents, and a bit of your own blood.

name: Alchemical Savant
desc: You can identify alchemical items quickly.

name: Far Lobber
desc: You’ve learned how to throw a longer distance.

name: Quick Bomber
desc: You keep your bombs in easy-to-reach pouches from which you draw without thinking.

name: Subtle Delivery
desc: You can capably deliver toxins with a blowgun.

name: Demolition Charge
desc: You can rig your bombs to inanimate objects in order to cause destruction to the surrounding area.

name: Poison Resistance
desc: Repeated exposure to toxic reagents has fortified your body against poisons of all kinds.

name: Revivifying Mutagen
desc: While under the effect of a mutagen, you can metabolize that mutagen’s power to heal yourself.

name: Smoke Bomb
desc: You cause the bomb to create a cloud of thick smoke, in addition to its normal effects.

name: Calculated Splash
desc: You have calculated all the angles to maximize a bomb’s splash.

name: Efficient Alchemy (Alchemist)
desc: Thanks to the time you’ve spent studying and experimenting, you know how to scale your formulas into larger batches that don’t require any additional attention.

name: Enduring Alchemy
desc: You’ve learned how to make your personal energy last just a little bit longer when quickly brewing ad hoc concoctions.

name: Healing Bomb
desc: By adding a special catalyst, you transform a healing elixir into a topical projectile.

name: Tenacious Toxins
desc: Your victims tend to expire long before your poisons, since the latter have been specifically formulated to last longer.

name: Artokus's Fire
desc: Artokus developed a mixture of volatile materials that burns hotter and longer than typical alchemist's fire.

name: Combine Elixirs
desc: You’ve discovered how to mix two elixirs into a single hybrid concoction.

name: Debilitating Bomb
desc: Your bombs impose additional effects on your enemies.

name: Directional Bombs
desc: You can lob bombs with great force and a precise trajectory to angle the splash in a cone spraying in a single direction.

name: Sticky Poison
desc: A combination of additional viscosity and careful application keeps your weapons poisoned even when suffering significant wear and tear.

name: Feral Mutagen
desc: Your bestial mutagen brings out the beast lurking within you.

name: Perpetual Breadth
desc: You have expanded your supply of near-infinite items.

name: Pinpoint Poisoner
desc: Unsuspecting targets are especially vulnerable to your poisons.

name: Sticky Bomb
desc: You mix in an additive to make your bomb’s contents adhere to the target and continue to deal damage.

name: Elastic Mutagen
desc: You can cause your body to twist and flow like the quicksilver within your mutagens.

name: Expanded Splash
desc: The particularly volatile compounds that you brew into your bombs result in them creating especially large and powerful explosions.

name: Greater Debilitating Bomb
desc: You have learned enhanced techniques and alchemical secrets that allow you to expand the range of effects you can impose with your bombs.

name: Merciful Elixir
desc: You mix a special additive into your elixir that calms the drinker’s body and mind.

name: Potent Poisoner
desc: By concentrating your poisons’ toxic components, you make them harder for victims to resist.

name: Unstable Concoction
desc: You can create extraordinary—albeit volatile—alchemical wonders, though they have an unfortunate tendency to violently explode when you use them.

name: Extend Elixir
desc: Integrating your own personal energy into the elixirs you create causes them to affect you for longer.

name: Invincible Mutagen
desc: The fortifying additives you brew into your mutagens make your juggernaut form impervious.

name: Shaped Contaminant
desc: Through a combination of careful manipulation and precise breath control, you can deploy inhaled toxins precisely.

name: Uncanny Bombs
desc: You lob bombs unerringly, despite obstructions or distance.

name: Glib Mutagen
desc: Your silvertongue mutagen transcends languages and plausibility.

name: Greater Merciful Elixir
desc: Your additives contain panaceas that can remedy a plethora of maladies.

name: True Debilitating Bomb
desc: Ever inventive, you have discovered increasingly devastating ways for your bombs to impede and hamper your foes.

name: Chemical Contagion
desc: With carefully engineered enzymes, you coax some of your poison to infect another target, using the original victim as a carrier.

name: Eternal Elixir
desc: Your body readily accepts and retains minor changes.

name: Exploitive Bomb
desc: You mix a substance into the bomb to foil resistances.

name: Genius Mutagen
desc: Specialized tweaks to your formula that supplements your genius considerably broaden the benefits you gain from cognitive mutagens.

name: Persistent Mutagen
desc: You’ve trained your physical form to remain stable within the a given altered state.

name: Improbable Elixirs
desc: Your mastery of alchemical secrets enables you to replicate effects most believe can be achieved only via magic.

name: Mindblank Mutagen
desc: With a minor adjustment of ratios in the formula for your serene mutagen, you gain mental protections.

name: Miracle Worker
desc: Your alchemical mastery can resuscitate the recently slain.

name: Perfect Debilitation
desc: You have perfected the formulas for bombs that impede your enemies.

name: Astonishing Explosion
desc: Your bomb incorporates an explosive spark of wonder that leaves witnesses dumbfounded.

name: Craft Philosopher's Stone
desc: Your research has paid off, culminating in the legendary philosopher’s stone.

name: Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)
desc: Prepare more alchemical items from your infused reagents.

name: Mega Bomb
desc: You add an incredibly powerful additive to a held bomb to create a mega bomb.

name: Perfect Mutagen
desc: You have enhanced the formulas for your mutagens, aligning them perfectly to your physiology.

name: Plum Deluge
desc: You have learned to saturate an area with poison.

name: Wish Alchemy
desc: You have learned Artokus Kirran's most hidden secrets, granting you the ability to create alchemy infused with the power of wishes.

name: Acute Vision
desc: Your sense improve when you are raging.

name: Adrenaline Rush
desc: In the heat of battle, you are capable of amazing feats of strength.

name: Draconic Arrogance
desc: Few can sway you from your goals while the fury of combat fills you.

name: Moment of Clarity
desc: You push back your rage for a moment in order to think clearly.

name: Raging Intimidation
desc: Your fury fills your foes with fear.

name: Raging Thrower
desc: Thrown weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from Rage to your thrown weapon attacks. If you have the Brutal Critical feat or the devastator class feature, apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.

name: Sudden Charge
desc: With a quick sprint, you dash up to your foe and swing.

name: Acute Scent
desc: When you Rage, your sense of smell improves.

name: Bashing Charge
desc: You smash, bust, and charge through solid obstacles without hesitation.

name: Furious Finish
desc: Desperate to finish the fight, you pour all your rage into one final blow.

name: No Escape
desc: You keep pace with a retreating foe.

name: Second Wind
desc: You can enter a second rage, but afterward you need to catch your breath.

name: Shake it Off
desc: You concentrate on your rage, overcoming fear and fighting back sickness.

name: Barreling Charge
desc: You rush forward, moving enemies aside to reach your foe.

name: Farabellus Flip
prerequisites: trained in medium armor; trained in Acrobatics
desc: Surprisingly agile even in a breastplate and carrying a full rucksack, Marcos Farabellus developed this evasive maneuver during one of his many adventures.

name: Fast Movement
desc: Your rage is a frenzy of rapid movements.

name: Oversized Throw
desc: With a great heave, you seize a piece of your surroundings, such as a boulder, log, table, wagon, or chunk of earth, and hurl it at your foes.

name: Raging Athlete
desc: Physical obstacles can’t hold back your fury.

name: Spiritual Guides
desc: Though no one sees them and only you can hear them, the spirits around you constantly chatter, save when you are raging.

name: Supernatural Senses
prerequisites: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
desc: Your scent is preternaturally sharp, and you can always rely on your sense of smell to help guide you when your vision is compromised.

name: Swipe
desc: You make a wide, arcing swing.

name: Wounded Rage
desc: You roar in pain, awakening the rage within you.

name: Animal Skin
desc: When you are raging and unarmored, your skin transforms into a thick hide.

name: Attack of Opportunity
desc: You swat a foe that leaves an opening.

name: Brutal Bully
desc: You push your foes around and leave bruises.

name: Cleave
desc: You swing clear through one foe and into another.

name: Dragon's Rage Breath
desc: You exhale powerful draconic energy.

name: Giant's Stature
desc: You grow to incredible size.

name: Inner Strength
desc: Your strength is part of your rage, so as long as your anger remains, you can gather your strength and rage to overcome any sort of enfeeblement.

name: Mage Hunter
desc: You use your hatred of magic to lash out at the sight of spellcasting, allowing you to interrupt an enemy's spell.

name: Nocturnal Sense
prerequisites: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent and low-light vision
desc: Your senses gain even greater clarity.

name: Scouring Rage
prerequisites: an instinct that allows you to change your additional damage from Rage to a different damage type
desc: You emit a powerful surge of instinctual energy when you unleash your potential.

name: Spirits' Interference
desc: You call forth protective spirits to ward off ranged attacks.

name: Animal Rage
desc: You transform into your animal.

name: Disarming Assault
desc: You attack with enough force to knock the weapon out of your foe's hands.

name: Follow-Up Assault
desc: Even in the face of failure you press the attack, determined to succeed.

name: Friendly Toss
desc: You toss your friends around the battlefield.

name: Furious Bully
desc: You bully foes across the battlefield.

name: Instinctive Strike
prerequisites: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
desc: You trust your instincts and your sense of smell, using all of your senses to pinpoint your opponent's location.

name: Renewed Vigor
desc: You pause to recover your raging vigor.

name: Share Rage
desc: You stoke an ally’s fury.

name: Sudden Leap
desc: You swing at a foe while mid-leap.

name: Thrash
desc: You thrash the grabbed foe around.

name: Come and Get Me
desc: You open yourself to attacks so you can respond in turn.

name: Determined Dash
desc: Nothing can keep you from your enemy.

name: Furious Sprint
desc: You rush forward.

name: Great Cleave
desc: Your fury carries your weapon through multiple foes.

name: Impressive Landing
desc: You slam into the ground, shattering it around you.

name: Knockback
desc: The weight of your swing drives your enemy back.

name: Overpowering Charge
desc: You trample your foes as you charge past them.

name: Resounding Blow
desc: You strike your enemy in the head with such force that their ears ring.

name: Silencing Strike
desc: A quick strike to the face or mouth silences your opponent.

name: Tangle of Battle
desc: Your incredibly vicious Strike pulls you right in close, giving you the opportunity to grab your foe.

name: Terrifying Howl
desc: You unleash a terrifying howl.

name: Dragon's Rage Wings
desc: You sprout dragon wings from your back.

name: Embrace the Pain
desc: Ignoring your pain, you reach out and grab the creature or weapon that caused you harm.

name: Furious Grab
desc: You grab your foe while it’s distracted by your attack.

name: Predator's Pounce
desc: You close the distance to your prey in a blur.

name: Spirit's Wrath
desc: You call forth an ephemeral apparition.

name: Sunder Spell
desc: You draw upon your superstitious fury to destroy a spell.

name: Titan's Stature
desc: You grow to even greater size.

name: Unbalancing Sweep
desc: You make a great sweep about yourself, knocking creatures off their feet and away from you.

name: Awesome Blow
desc: Your attacks are so powerful, they can flatten your opponents.

name: Giant's Lunge
desc: You extend your body and prepare to attack foes outside your normal reach.

name: Impaling Thrust
desc: You impale your enemy and hold them in place with your weapon.

name: Sunder Enchantment
desc: You can focus your superstition to break the magic of an item, in addition to destroying freestanding spells and those active on creatures.

name: Vengeful Strike
desc: When struck by an enemy, you respond in turn.

name: Whirlwind Strike
desc: You attack all nearby adversaries.

name: Collateral Thrash
desc: When you Thrash a grabbed foe, you smack that foe into another nearby.

name: Dragon Transformation
desc: You transform into a ferocious large dragon.

name: Furious Vengeance
desc: Your enemy's blow fuels your rage and provokes your immediate retaliation.

name: Penetrating Projectile
desc: Your projectiles are unhindered by flesh and bone.

name: Reckless Abandon
desc: Your blood boils when you take a beating, and you throw caution to the wind to finish the fight.

name: Shattering Blows
desc: Your forceful blows shatter objects with ease.

name: Brutal Critical
desc: Your critical hits are particularly devastating.

name: Perfect Clarity
desc: You burn out all of your rage to ensure that your attack lands and your mind remains free.

name: Vicious Evisceration
desc: You make a vicious attack that maims your enemy.

name: Annihilating Swing
desc: You have learned from the brute destructive power of xulgaths and their kind.

name: Contagious Rage
desc: You can drive your allies into a frenzy, granting them incredible benefits.

name: Quaking Stomp
desc: You stomp the ground with such force that it creates a minor earthquake.

name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
desc: You have become a brutal, unstoppable force of nature, able to shrug off mortal wounds with ease.

name: Whirlwind Toss
desc: You whirl a foe to smash into all nearby creatures before throwing them far away.

name: Bardic Lore
desc: Your studies make you informed on every subject.

name: Hymn of Healing
desc: You learn the hymn of healing composition spell (page 228), which imbues your music with rich melodies that help your allies recover from harm.

name: Lingering Composition
desc: By adding a flourish, you make your compositions last longer.

name: Martial Performance
desc: Your muse has taught you how to handle a wider variety of weapons than most bards, empowering you to effortlessly blend your performance into combat even with the most inelegant tools.

name: Reach Spell
desc: You can extend your spells’ range.

name: Versatile Performance
desc: You can rely on the grandeur of your performances rather than ordinary social skills.

name: Well-Versed
desc: You're resilient to performative influences that aren't your own.

name: Cantrip Expansion
desc: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

name: Directed Audience
desc: You can shape the area of your composition spells.

name: Esoteric Polymath
desc: You keep a book of occult spells, similar to a wizard’s spellbook.

name: Inspire Competence
desc: You learn to aid your allies’ skills with your performance.

name: Loremaster's Etude
desc: You magically unlock memories, making them easier to recall.

name: Multifarious Muse
desc: Your muse doesn’t fall into a single label.

name: Song of Strength
desc: Your performances inspire strength in your allies.

name: Combat Reading
desc: You use a performer's cold reading techniques, aura reading, and other tricks to discover your foe's strengths and weaknesses.

name: Courageous Advance
desc: With a rousing call, you exhort an ally to advance.

name: Inspire Defense
desc: You learn to protect yourself and your allies with your performance.

name: Melodious Spell
desc: You subtly weave your spellcasting into your performance.

name: Ritual Researcher
desc: Careful research into the art of rituals has made you better at performing them.

name: Triple Time
desc: You learn to speed up yourself and your allies with your performance.

name: Versatile Signature
desc: You’re always tweaking your available repertoire.

name: Assured Knowledge
desc: You can procure information with confidence.

name: Defensive Coordination
desc: Like the storied heroes who persist in the face of overwhelming odds, you and your allies will hold the line.

name: Dirge of Doom
desc: You learn to frighten your enemies with your performance.

name: Educate Allies
desc: You tweak the properties of your composition spell to convey a bit of your defensive knowledge.

name: Harmonize
desc: You can perform multiple compositions simultaneously.

name: Song of Marching
desc: You learn the song of marching composition cantrip, which enables you and your allies to cross vast distances without strain.

name: Steady Spellcasting
desc: You don’t lose spells easily.

name: Accompany
desc: You use your performances to supplement an ally's spellcasting, providing magical energy for their spells.

name: Call and Response
desc: Your composition takes the form of a call-and-response chant, which lets your allies continue the effect without you.

name: Courageous Opportunity
desc: You bellow a ferocious call to arms, inspiring yourself to lash out at a foe.

name: Eclectic Skill
desc: Your broad experiences translate to a range of skills.

name: Inspire Heroics
desc: Your performances inspire even greater deeds in your allies.

name: Know-It-All
desc: Your knowledge of the world expands beyond what you have read.

name: Soulsight
prerequisites: [Sorcerer] bloodline that grants divine or occult spells
desc: Your muse has opened your senses to the world beyond.

name: Annotate Composition
desc: By putting composition to paper, you can create a source of stirring words or song that others can read and understand.

name: Courageous Assault
desc: With a mighty shout, you can stir an ally to attack.

name: House of Imaginary Walls
desc: You erect an imaginary barrier others believe to be real.

name: Ode to Ouroboros
desc: You learn the ode to ouroboros composition spell, which enables you to temporarily spare your allies from death.

name: Quickened Casting
desc: You are able to quickly cast a spell.

name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
desc: You learn the symphony of the unfettered heart composition spell, which enables you to protect an ally against incapacitating conditions.

name: Unusual Composition
desc: You can translate the emotion and power of a composition to other mediums.

name: Eclectic Polymath
desc: Your flexible mind can quickly shift spells.

name: Enigma's Knowledge
desc: Your muse whispers knowledge to you at all the right times.

name: Inspirational Focus
desc: Your connection to your muse has granted you unusual focus.

name: Reverberate
desc: You can manipulate the acoustics around you to deflect sonic damage back at its source.

name: Shared Assault
desc: In the triumph of battle, you can share the glory with another ally.

name: Silver's Refrain
desc: Learn the silver's refrain composition cantrip.

name: Allegro
desc: You can quicken your allies with a fast-paced performance.

name: Earworm
desc: By endlessly repeating a motif, you implant an earworm, a memorable song that repeats over and over again in your allies' heads, preparing them to respond to it later.

name: Soothing Ballad
desc: You soothe your allies’ wounds with the power of your performance.

name: Triumphant Inspiration
desc: With a triumphant shout, you inspire your allies.

name: True Hypercognition
desc: Your mind works at an incredible pace.

name: Vigorous Inspiration
desc: You instill magical vigor in your allies when you inspire them to attack.

name: Courageous Onslaught
desc: You use your performance to orchestrate an onslaught against your enemies.

name: Effortless Concentration
desc: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

name: Resounding Finale
desc: You bring your performance to a sudden, dramatic finish, drowning out other sounds.

name: Studious Capacity
desc: Your continued study of occult magic has increased your magical capacity.

name: All in my Head
desc: Using your occult connections and incredible powers of persuasion, you convince yourself that the triggering damage is a figment of your imagination.

name: Deep Lore
desc: Your repertoire is vast, containing far more spells than usual.

name: Discordant Voice
desc: Your inspire courage lets loose a discordant shriek that imbues your allies' attacks with powerful sonic reverberations.

name: Eternal Composition
desc: The world is a stage upon which you are always playing.

name: Impossible Polymath
prerequisites: Esoteric Polymath; trained in Arcana, trained in Occultism, or trained in Religion
desc: Your esoteric formulas are so unusual that they allow you to dabble in magic from diverse traditions.

name: Fatal Aria
desc: Your songs overwhelm the target with unbearable emotion.

name: Head of the Night Parade
desc: You remember the revelry of the Night Parade and call them to your aid in a riotous display.

name: Perfect Encore
desc: You develop another incredible creation.

name: Pied Piping
desc: You learn the pied piping composition spell, which enables you to control the actions of weak-minded individuals.

name: Ringmaster's Introduction
desc: You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action.

name: Song of the Fallen
desc: Gain the song of the fallen focus spell.

name: Symphony of the Muses
desc: You are able to weave countless performances together into a solo symphony.

name: Ultimate Polymath
desc: You can flexibly cast all of your spells, granting a dizzying array of possible options.

name: Deity's Domain
desc: You embody an aspect of your deity.

name: Desperate Prayer
desc: You call out to your deity in a plea for their aid.

name: Everstand Stance
desc: You brace your shield with both hands, enhancing its potential for both offense and defense.

name: Iron Repercussions
desc: Disobeying your Iron Command has lasting consequences.

name: Ongoing Selfishness
desc: Your powerful personality and incredible ego demand that you protect yourself above all else.

name: Ranged Reprisal
desc: You can use Retributive Strike with a ranged weapon.

name: Splinter Faith
desc: Your faith in your deity is represented in an extremely unusual way that some might call heretical

name: Unimpeded Step
desc: With a burst of divine liberation, your spur your ally’s movement.

name: Vicious Vengeance
desc: While your vengeance is painful for both you and your foe, none can doubt that your enemies suffer more.

name: Weight of Guilt
desc: Guilt clouds the minds of those who ignore your Glimpse of Redemption.

name: Conceited Mindset
desc: Because you know your mind is superior, you scoff at anyone who would alter your mental state—but this hubris gets the better of you when you're wrong.

name: Divine Grace
desc: You call upon your deity’s grace.

name: Dragonslayer Oath
desc: You’ve sworn to slay evil dragons.

name: Esoteric Oath
desc: You've sworn an oath to slay the alien abominations that lurk in the remote corners of Golarion.

name: Fiendsbane Oath
desc: You’ve sworn an oath to banish the corruption of fiends to the dark planes they call home.

name: Lightslayer Oath
desc: You've sworn to rid the world of the self-righteousness of celestial beings.

name: Shining Oath
desc: You’ve sworn an oath to put the undead to rest.

name: Vengeful Oath
desc: You’ve sworn an oath to hunt down wicked evildoers and bring them to judgment.

name: Accelerating Touch
desc: Your healing energies are infused with bounding energy.

name: Aura of Courage
desc: You stand strong in the face of danger and inspire your allies to do the same.

name: Aura of Despair
desc: Your presence as an avatar of evil makes your foes more susceptible to terror and makes it almost impossible for them to shake off fear when you are near.

name: Cruelty
desc: The harm you deal with your corrupting touch saps the strength from your enemy's body.

name: Divine Health
desc: Your faith makes you resistant to disease.

name: Everstand Strike
desc: Your follow-up blow leaves you an opening to set your shield.

name: Light of Revelation
desc: You’ve learned to call upon light to reveal what is hidden.

name: Mercy
desc: Your touch relieves fear and restores movement.

name: Sun Blade
desc: You can unleash burning sunlight from your sword or spear.

name: Corrupted Shield
desc: Your shield ally is more than just a spirit of protection— it's a conduit for deadly divine magic.

name: Invigorating Mercy
desc: Your divine touch rejuvenates the weak and tired.

name: Litany Against Wrath
desc: You excoriate a foe for its wrath against goodly creatures.

name: Loyal Warhorse
desc: You and your mount have grown closer, and your loyalty to each other is unbreakable.

name: Shield Warden
prerequisites: [Champion] divine ally (shield); tenets of good; [Fighter] Shield Block
desc: You use your shield to protect your allies as well as yourself.

name: Smite Evil
desc: Your blade ally becomes an even more powerful tool against evildoers.

name: Smite Good
desc: Your blade ally shares your lust for the blood of good creatures.

name: Advanced Deity's Domain
desc: Through your conviction, you have glimpsed the deeper secrets of your deity’s domain.

name: Greater Cruelty
desc: The extent of the corruption within you does more than simply sap your foes' strength, it devastates their minds and reflexes.

name: Greater Mercy
desc: Your faith enhances your ability to remove conditions.

name: Heal Mount
prerequisites: divine ally (steed); devotion spell (lay on hands)
desc: Your devotion to your mount manifests as a surge of positive energy.

name: Impassable Wall Stance
desc: You refuse to let foes past your guard.

name: Quick Block
desc: You can block with your shield instinctively.

name: Sacrifice Armor
desc: With divine awareness, you twist your body to lessen the impact of an attack.

name: Second Ally
desc: Your inner grace attracts the attention of a second protective spirit.

name: Sense Evil
desc: You sense evil as a queasy or foreboding feeling.

name: Sense Good
desc: The presence of goodness sickens you with its saccharine self-righteousness.

name: Devoted Focus
desc: Your devotion is strong enough to increase your focus to incredible heights.

name: Elucidating Mercy
desc: Your mercy grants clarity to those around you just when they need it most.

name: Imposing Destrier
desc: Under your care, your mount has realized its innate potential.

name: Litany Against Sloth
desc: You rail against the sin of sloth, turning a foe’s laziness against it.

name: Litany of Self-Interest
desc: You compel a creature to act toward its own ends rather than consider others.

name: Radiant Blade Spirit
desc: Your divine ally radiates power, enhancing your chosen weapon.

name: Resilient Touch
desc: Your healing energies create an aura of protection that defends your allies against more than just blades and arrows.

name: Shield of Reckoning
desc: When you shield your ally against an attack, you call upon your power to protect your ally further.

name: Affliction Mercy
desc: The divine grace that flows through you grants reprieve from an affliction.

name: Amplifying Touch
desc: Your healing energies empower attacks.

name: Aura of Faith
desc: You radiate an aura of pure belief that imbues your attacks and those of nearby allies with holy power.

name: Blade of Justice
desc: You call upon divine power and make a weapon or unarmed Strike against a foe you have witnessed harming an ally or innocent.

name: Champion's Sacrifice
desc: You can suffer so that others might live.

name: Divine Wall
desc: You use your shield to harry your enemies, preventing them from stepping away from or around you.

name: Enforce Oath
prerequisites: You've sworn to an oath against a specific type of creature.
desc: You call on your oath to embolden you in combat.

name: Gruesome Strike
prerequisites: tenets of evil; champion's reaction that grants extra damage with your Strikes
desc: Make a Strike against the creature that triggered your champion's reaction.

name: Lasting Doubt
desc: When you cast doubt upon your foes, the effect lasts longer than usual.

name: Liberating Stride
desc: Your allies can move farther when you release them from harm.

name: Pale Horse
desc: Your mount becomes a grotesque creature of foreboding when you ride it.

name: Anchoring Aura
desc: Your aura hampers fiends’ teleportation.

name: Aura of Life
desc: Your aura protects against necromantic effects.

name: Aura of Preservation
desc: Your aura protects against the twisting powers of aberrations.

name: Aura of Righteousness
desc: Your righteous aura dampens evil’s might.

name: Aura of Vengeance
desc: When you call upon others to take retribution, you also guide their aim.

name: Divine Reflexes
desc: You can use your champion's reaction more.

name: Greater Interpose
desc: Your divine grace empowers you to avoid hits when you otherwise could not.

name: Litany of Depravity
desc: You undercut your enemy's vain moralism, opening their heart to evil.

name: Litany of Righteousness
desc: You call upon righteousness to expose an evil foe’s weakness.

name: Wyrmbane Aura
desc: Your aura protects against destructive energies and dragons’ breath.

name: Auspicious Mount
desc: Guided by your ongoing care, your steed has developed incredible intelligence and skill.

name: Expand Aura
prerequisites: You have at least one aura from a champion feat or feature.
desc: You focus your divine power to extend your influence.

name: Instrument of Slaughter
desc: Your blade ally thirsts for the blood of your foes.

name: Instrument of Zeal
desc: Divine energy fills your weapon.

name: Shield of Grace
desc: You protect an ally with both your shield and your body.

name: Celestial Form
desc: You take on a celestial countenance, appearing like a type of celestial who serves your deity.

name: Fiendish Form
desc: Your features reshape into those of a type of fiend who serves your deity; for example, as a demon you might have putrid scales, twisted horns, and red eyes.

name: Rejuvenating Touch
desc: Your healing energies linger after you cast, providing continual benefits.

name: Ultimate Mercy
desc: Your mercy transcends the bounds of life and death.

name: Aura of Unbreakable Virtue
desc: Overwhelm evil creatures with your aura.

name: Banishing Blow
desc: The erratic teleportation magic you experienced in the Kortos Mounts has taught you a few tricks.

name: Celestial Mount
desc: Your steed gains incredible celestial powers granted by your deity.

name: Everdistant Defense
desc: You have learned that distance can foil enemies better than any armor.

name: Fiendish Mount
desc: Your steed ally manifests a suite of powerful and sinister gifts granted to it by your deity.

name: Radiant Blade Master
desc: Your divine ally turns your chosen weapon into a paragon of its type.

name: Sacred Defender
desc: You are a great warrior that can stand strong against the fiercest opponents to your cause.

name: Shield Paragon
desc: Your shield is a vessel of divine protection.

name: Deadly Simplicity
prerequisites: deity with a simple or unarmed attack favored weapon, trained with your deity's favored weapon
desc: Your deity’s weapon is especially powerful in your hands.

name: Domain Initiate
desc: Your deity bestows a special spell related to their powers.

name: False Faith
source: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City
desc: Droskar knows you may need to disguise yourself in societies that oppose your faith.

name: Harming Hands
desc: The mordant power of your negative energy grows.

name: Healing Hands
desc: Your positive energy is even more vibrant and restorative.

name: Holy Castigation
desc: You combine holy energy with positive energy to damage demons, devils, and their evil ilk.

name: Premonition of Avoidance
desc: Your deity grants you limited foresight, warning you of dangers an instant before they occur.

name: Syncretism
desc: You have come to see the overlap between two deities’ teachings

name: Vile Desecration
desc: You combine unholy might with negative energy to damage angels, archons, and other self-righteous denizens of the Outer Planes.

name: Communal Healing
desc: You’re a conduit for positive energy, and as you channel it through you, it heals some of your minor injuries.

name: Emblazon Armament
desc: Carefully etching a sacred image into a physical object, you steel yourself for battle.

name: Rapid Response
desc: You work quickly and efficiently in times of danger to deliver needed assistance.

name: Sap Life
desc: You draw the life force out of your enemies to heal your own wounds.

name: Turn Undead
desc: Undead harmed by your positive energy might flee, compelled by an innate aversion to the force opposite undeath.

name: Versatile Font
prerequisites: harmful font or healing font; deity that allows clerics to have both fonts
desc: As you explore your deity’s aspects, you move beyond restrictions on healing or harming.

name: Channel Smite
desc: You siphon the destructive energies of positive or negative energy through a melee attack and into your foe.

name: Command Undead
desc: You grasp the animating force within an undead creature and bend it to your will.

name: Directed Channel
desc: You can shape the energy you channel in a single direction, reaching farther and in a more directed fashion.

name: Expanded Domain Initiate
desc: You have long venerated one of your deity’s lesser-known aspects

name: Improved Communal Healing
desc: You can direct excess channeled energy outward to benefit an ally.

name: Necrotic Infusion
desc: You pour negative energy into your undead subject to empower its attacks.

name: Radiant Infusion
desc: You pour invigorating positive energy into a living ally.

name: Cast Down
desc: The sheer force of your faith can bring a foe crashing down.

name: Divine Weapon
desc: You siphon residual spell energy into a weapon you’re wielding.

name: Magic Hands
desc: The blessing of your deity heightens your healing ability, making your mundane healing work as if by magic.

name: Selective Energy
desc: As you call down divine power, you can prevent some enemies from benefiting or some allies from being hurt.

name: Advanced Domain
desc: Your studies or prayers have unlocked deeper secrets of your deity’s domain.

name: Align Armament
prerequisites: chaotic, evil, good, or lawful deity
desc: You bring a weapon into metaphysical concordance with your deity’s beliefs.

name: Channeled Succor
desc: You can remove conditions with divine grace.

name: Cremate Undead
desc: Your positive energy sets undead alight.

name: Emblazon Energy
desc: With elemental forces, you make your emblazoned symbols more potent.

name: Martyr
desc: You go to extreme lengths to support your allies, even when it means bringing harm to yourself.

name: Surging Focus
desc: When an ally you can see falls in battle, your fight or flight response triggers a surge in your deity's might within you.

name: Castigating Weapon
desc: The force of your deity’s castigation strengthens your body so you can strike down the wicked.

name: Heroic Recovery
desc: The restorative power of your healing invigorates the recipient.

name: Improved Command Undead
prerequisites: harmful font; Command Undead; evil alignment
desc: Undead creatures find it all but impossible to resist your commands.

name: Replenishment of War
prerequisites: expert in your deity’s favored weapon
desc: Striking out against your enemies draws praise and protection from your deity.

name: Shared Avoidance
desc: You can project your premonitions of danger to your allies.

name: Shield of Faith
desc: Residual energy from your domain spells bolsters your defenses.

name: Through Spell
desc: Spells you cast can transform briefly into vital essence, traveling harmlessly through living and undead creatures between you and your target, blocked only by solid objects.

name: Defensive Recovery
desc: Your faith provides temporary protection in addition to healing.

name: Domain Focus
desc: Your devotion to your deity’s domains grows greater, and so does the power granted to you.

name: Emblazon Antimagic
desc: Your deity’s symbol protects against offensive magic.

name: Shared Replenishment
desc: When your deity blesses your warlike acts, you can extend that favor to your allies.

name: Deity's Protection
desc: When you call upon your deity’s power to fulfill the promise of their domain, you gain divine protection.

name: Ebb and Flow
desc: You can pull forth both positive and negative energy simultaneously to harm your enemies and heal your allies.

name: Extend Armament Alignment
desc: The alignment you impose on a weapon lasts much longer.

name: Fast Channel
desc: Divine power is always at your fingertips, swiftly responding to your call.

name: Premonition of Clarity
desc: Your deity sends you a vision of faith to steel you against mental attacks.

name: Swift Banishment
desc: The force of your blow sends your victim back to its home plane.

name: Eternal Bane
desc: A life of evil has made you a nexus for your deity’s vile power.

name: Eternal Blessing
desc: Your good deeds have brought your deity’s grace to you for all of eternity.

name: Remediate
desc: If your next action is to use your divine font to cast a 3-action heal or harm spell to damage creatures, you can harness the residual energy to counterbalance opposing forces.

name: Resurrectionist
desc: You can cause a creature you bring back from the brink of death to thrive and continue healing.

name: Domain Wellspring
desc: The intensity of your focus grows from the investment you’ve placed in your domains.

name: Echoing Channel
desc: When you pull forth positive or negative energy, you also create a smaller pocket of that energy.

name: Improved Swift Banishment
desc: You easily banish creatures with your weapon.

name: Miraculous Possibility
desc: Your deity empowers you to perform minor miracles, allowing you to readily adapt to the fluctuating needs of your duties.

name: Shared Clarity
desc: You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies.

name: Avatar's Audience
desc: Your extensive service has made you a lesser herald of your deity, which affords you certain privileges.

name: Dance of Intercession
desc: You either performed in or stood witness to the dance used to invoke the Celestial Dragon and can harness a sliver of their power.

name: Denier of Destruction
desc: You can manipulate the same energies that the aeon orbs use to sustain life.

name: Emblazon Divinity
desc: Emblazon more equipment at the same time.

name: Maker of Miracles
desc: You are a conduit for truly deific power.

name: Metamagic Channel
desc: Deep understanding of divine revelations into the nature of vital essence allows you to freely manipulate the effects of your positive or negative energy.

name: Animal Companion
desc: You gain the service of a young animal companion that travels with you.

name: Leshy Familiar
desc: You gain a leshy familiar, a tiny plant that embodies one of the many spirits of nature.

name: Storm Born
desc: You are at home out in the elements, reveling in the power of nature unleashed.

name: Verdant Weapon
desc: You cultivate a seed that can sprout into a wooden staff, vine whip, or another weapon.

name: Widen Spell
desc: You manipulate the energy of your spell, causing it to spread out and affect a wider area.

name: Wild Shape
desc: You are one with the wild, always changing and adapting to meet any challenge.

name: Call of the Wild
desc: You call upon the creatures of nature to come to your aid.

name: Enhanced Familiar
desc: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

name: Order Explorer
desc: You have learned the secrets of another druidic order.

name: Elemental Summons
desc: You can call the four elements to you.

name: Form Control
desc: With additional care and effort, you can take on an alternate form for a longer period of time.

name: Leshy Familiar Secrets
desc: The leaf order's secrets allow your familiar to take advantage of its leshy form.

name: Mature Animal Companion (Druid)
desc: Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion, which grants it additional capabilities.

name: Order Magic
desc: You have delved deeper into the teaching of a new order, gaining access to a coveted order spell.

name: Thousand Faces
desc: Your form is as mutable as the weather, changing to meet your whim.

name: Woodland Stride
desc: You can always find a path, almost as if foliage parted before you.

name: Current Spell
desc: As you use your magic to manipulate air or water, you divert some of its currents to form a barrier around you.

name: Green Empathy
desc: You can communicate with plants on a basic level and use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on them and to make very simple Requests of them.

name: Insect Shape
desc: Your understanding of life expands, allowing you to mimic a wider range of creatures.

name: Storm Retribution
prerequisites: storm order; tempest surge order spell
desc: You lash out, directing a burst of storming fury toward a creature that has harmed you.

name: Deimatic Display
desc: Imitating animal threat displays, you make yourself appear larger and more imposing.

name: Ferocious Shape
desc: You have mastered the shape of ferocious dinosaurs.

name: Fey Caller
desc: You have learned some of the tricks the fey use to bend primal magic toward illusions and trickery.

name: Incredible Companion (Druid)
desc: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop.

name: Soaring Shape
desc: Wings free you from the shackles of the ground below.

name: Wind Caller
desc: You bid the winds to lift and carry you through the air.

name: Elemental Shape
desc: You understand the fundamental elements of nature such that you can imbue them into your body.

name: Healing Transformation
desc: You can take advantage of shapechanging magic to close wounds and patch injuries.

name: Overwhelming Energy
desc: You alter your spells to overcome resistances.

name: Plant Shape
desc: You can take the form of a plant creature.

name: Pristine Weapon
desc: Your verdant weapon can cut through the resistances of magical creatures.

name: Side by Side (Druid)
desc: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them off balance.

name: Dragon Shape
desc: You can take on the form of some of the world’s most fearsome creatures.

name: Green Tongue
desc: You share a special kinship with all things green and living.

name: Pesh Skin
desc: Your plant form sprouts hundreds of spines, and your blood causes mild hallucinations in creatures exposed to it.

name: Primal Focus
desc: Your connection to nature is particularly strong, and the spirits of nature flock around you, helping you replenish your focus.

name: Primal Summons
desc: Whenever you summon an ally, you can empower it with the elemental power of air, earth, fire, or water.

name: Wandering Oasis
desc: You're surrounded by soothing energy.

name: Reactive Transformation
prerequisites: Wild Shape; Dragon Shape, Elemental Shape, Plant Shape, or Soaring Shape
desc: You transform reflexively when in danger.

name: Sow Spell
desc: You fold your spell into a seed.

name: Specialized Companion (Druid)
desc: Your animal companion continues to grow in power and ability, and it is now cunning enough to become specialized.

name: Timeless Nature
desc: With primal magic sustaining you, you cease aging.

name: Verdant Metamorphosis
desc: You transform into a plant version of yourself.

name: Impaling Briars
desc: You can fill an area with devastating briars that impale and impede your foes.

name: Monstrosity Shape
desc: You can transform into a powerful magical creature.

name: Invoke Disaster
desc: You can invoke nature’s fury upon your foes.

name: Perfect Form Control
desc: Thanks to magic and muscle memory, you can stay in your alternate forms indefinitely.

name: Primal Aegis
desc: You surround yourself with a thick field of protective primal energy.

name: Primal Wellspring
desc: Your reservoir of Focus Points is a deep wellspring.

name: Apex Companion
desc: Gain the apex companion focus spell.

name: Heart of the Kaiju
desc: Witnessing the might of a kaiju up close awoke a new ferocity within you.

name: Hierophant's Power
desc: You have entwined yourself with the natural world, and its full power flows through you.

name: Leyline Conduit
desc: You can cast your spells effortlessly by tapping into the leylines of the world.

name: True Shapeshifter
desc: You transcend the limitations of form.

name: Verdant Presence
desc: The life-giving properties of the aeon orbs flourish within you.

name: Combat Assessment
desc: You make a telegraphed attack to learn about your foe.

name: Double Slice
desc: You lash out at your foe with both weapons.

name: Exacting Strike
desc: You make a controlled attack, fully accounting for your momentum.

name: Point-Blank Shot
desc: You take aim to pick off nearby enemies quickly.

name: Power Attack
desc: You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady.

name: Reactive Shield
desc: You can snap your shield into place just as you would take a blow, avoiding the hit at the last second.

name: Snagging Strike
desc: You combine an attack with quick grappling moves to throw an enemy off balance as long as it stays in your reach.

name: Aggressive Block
desc: You push back as you block the attack, knocking your foe away or off balance.

name: Assisting Shot
desc: With a quick shot, you interfere with a foe in combat.

name: Brutish Shove
desc: Throwing your weight behind your attack, you hit you opponent hard enough to make it stumble back.

name: Combat Grab
desc: You swipe at your opponent and grab at them.

name: Dragging Strike
desc: You aim your weapon to snag a foe's armor, clothing, or flesh to pull them closer.

name: Dueling Parry (Fighter)
desc: You can parry attacks against you with your one-handed weapon.

name: Intimidating Strike
desc: Your blow not only wounds creatures but also shatters their confidence.

name: Lunge
desc: Extending your body to its limits, you attack an enemy that would normally be beyond your reach.

name: Rebounding Toss
desc: You bounce your weapon off one foe to strike another.

name: Double Shot
desc: You shoot twice in blindingly fast succession.

name: Dual-Handed Assault
desc: You snap your free hand over to grip your weapon just long enough to add momentum and deliver a more powerful blow to your opponent.

name: Knockdown
desc: You make an attack to knock a foe off balance, then follow up immediately with a sweep to topple them.

name: Parting Shot
desc: You jump back and fire a quick shot that catches your opponent off guard.

name: Powerful Shove
desc: You can push larger foes around with your attack.

name: Quick Reversal
desc: You turn your foes’ flanking against them with a quick reverse.

name: Shielded Stride
desc: When your shield is up, your enemies’ blows can’t touch you.

name: Twin Parry
desc: You use your two weapons to parry attacks.

name: Advanced Weapon Training
desc: You’ve studied the art of wielding an advanced weapon.

name: Advantageous Assault
desc: When an enemy’s movement is compromised, you deliver a more deadly blow.

name: Dazing Blow
desc: You pummel a held foe, hoping to stagger them.

name: Disarming Stance
desc: You adopt a fencing stance that improves your control over your weapon.

name: Furious Focus
desc: You’ve learned to maintain your balance even when swinging furiously.

name: Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)
desc: You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally.

name: Reflexive Shield
desc: You can use your shield to fend off the worst of area effects and other damage.

name: Revealing Stab
desc: You drive your piercing weapon into an imperceptible foe, revealing its location to your allies.

name: Ricochet Stance (Fighter)
desc: You adopt a stance designed to rebound your thrown weapons back toward you.

name: Shatter Defenses
desc: Your offense exploits your enemy’s fear. Make a melee Strike against a frightened creature.

name: Triple Shot
desc: You can quickly fire multiple shots with greater control.

name: Blind-Fight
desc: Your battle instincts make you more aware of concealed and invisible opponents.

name: Disorienting Opening
desc: You use your foes' openings to expose even greater weaknesses.

name: Dueling Riposte
desc: You riposte against your flailing enemy.

name: Felling Strike
desc: Your attack can ground an airborne foe.

name: Incredible Aim
desc: By spending a moment to focus, you can ensure your attack strikes true.

name: Mobile Shot Stance
desc: Your shots become nimble and deadly.

name: Positioning Assault
desc: With punishing blows, you force your opponent into position.

name: Quick Shield Block
desc: You can bring your shield into place with hardly a thought.

name: Resounding Bravery
desc: Even your fears serve as fuel for your fighting spirit.

name: Agile Grace
desc: Your graceful moves with agile weapons are beyond compare.

name: Certain Strike
desc: Even when you don’t hit squarely, you can still score a glancing blow.

name: Combat Reflexes
desc: You are particularly swift at punishing foes who leave you openings.

name: Cut from the Air
desc: You can knock aside ranged attacks.

name: Debilitating Shot
desc: Aiming for a weak point, you impede your foe with a precise shot.

name: Disarming Twist
desc: After your initial attack redirects your foe’s defenses, your follow-up wrests their weapon from their grasp.

name: Disruptive Stance
desc: The slightest distraction can provoke your wrath, and you’re prepared to foil enemies’ actions.

name: Fearsome Brute
desc: Fear makes your foes weak and more vulnerable to your attacks.

name: Improved Knockdown
desc: You can dash your foe to the ground with a single blow.

name: Mirror Shield
desc: You reflect the spell back against the triggering opponent.

name: Twin Riposte
desc: A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon.

name: Brutal Finish
desc: Your final blow can make an impact even if it rebounds off a foe’s defenses.

name: Dueling Dance (Fighter)
desc: Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

name: Flinging Shove
desc: Your opponets go even farther when push them around.

name: Improved Dueling Riposte
desc: Your weapon whirls and darts, striking foes whenever the opportunity presents itself.

name: Incredible Ricochet
desc: After your first shot singles out your opponent's position, you direct another that ricochets around obstacles and strikes unerringly.

name: Lunging Stance
desc: Your body coiled to strike, you can lash out at distant enemies.

name: Paragon's Guard
desc: Once you’ve had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought.

name: Spring Attack
desc: Springing away from one foe, you Strike at another.

name: Desperate Finisher
desc: You throw everything into one last press.

name: Determination
desc: Your training allows you to shrug off your foes’ spells and conditions when the need is dire.

name: Guiding Finish
desc: Using your weapon as a lever, you force your opponent to end up right where you want them.

name: Guiding Riposte
desc: By shifting your weight and angling your weapon, you guide your opponent to a more favorable position.

name: Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter)
desc: Your weapons are a blur, blocking and biting at your foes.

name: Stance Savant (Fighter)
desc: When there’s imminent danger, you drop into a stance with a mere thought.

name: Two-Weapon Flurry
desc: You lash out with both your weapons in a sudden frenzy.

name: Graceful Poise
desc: With the right positioning, your off-hand weapon can strike like a scorpion’s stinger.

name: Improved Reflexive Shield
desc: Your shield can help save nearby allies.

name: Multishot Stance
desc: You lock yourself in a stable position so you can fire swiftly and accurately.

name: Overwhelming Blow
desc: You throw your weight into a powerful attack that leaves you vulnerable.

name: Twinned Defense (Fighter)
desc: You’re always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.

name: Impossible Volley
desc: You fire a volley at all foes in an area.

name: Savage Critical
desc: The wounds you inflict are grievous.

name: Smash from the Air
desc: Your expertise enables you to knock away spells.

name: Boundless Reprisals
desc: With a sixth sense for the flow of combat, you can quickly react to any situation as required.

name: Reflecting Riposte
prerequisites: Dueling Riposte, Mirror Shield, or Twin Riposte
desc: You attempt to counteract the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts.

name: Sever Space
desc: You destroy the space between you and your targets, allowing you to strike with your melee weapons at great range.

name: Ultimate Flexibility
desc: Your experience keeps you on your toes, making you adaptable to even the most dangerous challenges.

name: Weapon Supremacy
desc: Your skill with weapons lets you attack swiftly at all times.

name: Flexible Studies
desc: You've collected a cross-section of information on various disciplines you can refer to when preparing for various tasks.

name: Known Weaknesses
desc: Whenever you Devise a Stratagem, you can also attempt a check to Recall Knowledge as part of that action.

name: Takedown Expert
desc: You've mastered combat practices that let you get up close and bring down perpetrators alive.

name: That's Odd
desc: When you enter a new location, such as a room or corridor, you immediately notice one thing out of the ordinary.

name: Trap Finder
desc: You have an intuitive sense that alerts you to the dangers and presence of traps.

name: Underworld Investigator
desc: Your work as an investigator makes you familiar with the criminal element.

name: Athletic Strategist
desc: You know how to calculatedly manipulate joints and body weight.

name: Red Herring
desc: You have a keen sense for avoiding spurious lines of inquiry.

name: Shared Stratagem
desc: The plans you make include your allies as well as yourself.

name: Solid Lead
desc: Sometimes your case splinters into smaller mysteries, but you never lose sight of the big picture.

name: Alchemical Discoveries
desc: You've devoted extra time in the lab to improve your knowledge of alchemy.

name: Detective's Readiness
desc: When you're on a case, you stay watchful and resolute to avoid tricks your suspect might pull.

name: Lie Detector
desc: You're adept at noticing the tells of a liar—sweat, flushing, a quavering voice, a quickening pulse.

name: Ongoing Investigation
desc: You're always investigating what's around you, even as you perform other activities.

name: Scalpel's Point
desc: Your stratagems benefit from your precise knowledge of anatomy.

name: Strategic Assessment
desc: You learn your foes' strengths and weaknesses by watching them move.

name: Connect the Dots
desc: Ephemeral connections between people, places, and concepts are invisible to most, but seeing them is your stock and trade.

name: Predictive Purchase (Investigator)
desc: You have just the thing for the situation.

name: Thorough Research
desc: When you succeed at a Recall Knowledge check, you learn an additional fact about the subject.

name: Clue Them All In
desc: You can clue in all your allies at once.

name: Whodunnit?
desc: You carefully consider your case and narrow down some of the details.

name: Just One More Thing
desc: After your attempt to influence someone goes poorly, you add another bit of information or ask a pointed question, possibly salvaging your previous attempt.

name: Ongoing Strategy
desc: You're constantly studying small aspects of everyone's movements, even if you don't have a stratagem in place ahead of time.

name: Suspect of Opportunity
desc: Sometimes something intrudes upon your case unexpectedly, such as an ambush sent to bring your investigation to a close.

name: Foresee Danger
desc: You perceive every possible way your foe's attack could land and attempt to avoid them all.

name: Reason Rapidly
desc: Your mind works through clues at an unbelievable speed.

name: Plot the Future
desc: You spend 10 minutes in contemplation to uncannily predict how events will play out.

name: Sense the Unseen
desc: When you look for foes, you can catch even the slightest cues.

name: Strategic Bypass
desc: Your plans account for your foes' resistances, enabling you to strike a telling blow.

name: Didactic Strike
desc: When you find a glaring weakness, you can set your allies up to annihilate your foe.

name: Implausible Purchase (Investigator)
desc: It seems impossible, but you've analyzed every angle and are able to just keep pulling out exactly the item you need, even in far-flung locations.

name: Reconstruct the Scene
desc: You spend 1 minute surveying a small location (such as a single room) to get an impression of events that occurred there in the last day.

name: Lead Investigator
desc: You spend 1 minute briefing up to four allies about one lead you're pursuing.

name: Trickster's Ace
desc: You have a contingency in your back pocket for desperate situations.

name: All the Time in the World
desc: Your firsthand experience of the subjective nature of time and space has given you new observational insights.

name: Everyone's a Suspect
desc: You are so suspicious of everyone you meet that you keep mental notes on how to defeat them all—even your own allies.

name: Just the Facts
desc: You fundamentally understand everything to the point where your research can't possibly be wrong.

name: Crane Stance
desc: You enter the stance of a crane, holding your arms in an imitation of a crane’s wings.

name: Dragon Stance
desc: You enter the stance of a dragon and make powerful leg strikes like a lashing dragon’s tail.

name: Gorilla Stance
desc: You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance.

name: Ki Rush
desc: You can use ki to move with extraordinary speed and make yourself harder to hit.

name: Ki Strike
desc: Your study of the flow of mystical energy allows you to harness it into your physical strikes.

name: Monastic Archer Stance
desc: You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of a bow.

name: Monastic Weaponry
desc: You have trained with the traditional weaponry of your monastery or school.

name: Mountain Stance
desc: You enter the stance of an implacable mountain allowing you to strike with the weight of an avalanche.

name: Rain of Embers Stance
desc: You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix, holding your fingers as rigid as deadly talons while moving with quick, flickering gestures that dance with biting flames.

name: Stumbling Stance
desc: You enter a seemingly unfocused stance that mimics the movements of the inebriated—bobbing, weaving, leaving false openings, and distracting your enemies from your true movements.

name: Tiger Stance
desc: You enter the stance of a tiger and can make tiger claw attacks.

name: Wolf Stance
desc: You enter the stance of a wolf, low to the ground with your hands held like fanged teeth.

name: Ancestral Weaponry
prerequisites: Monastic Weaponry; a feat granting access to all weapons with an ancestry trait (such as elf or orc)
desc: You blend monastic techniques with the ancestral fighting styles of your people.

name: Brawling Focus
desc: You know how to make the most of your attacks when fighting hand-to-hand.

name: Crushing Grab
desc: Like a powerful constrictor, you crush targets in your unyielding grasp.

name: Dancing Leaf
desc: You are as light as a leaf whirling in the breeze.

name: Elemental Fist
desc: You call upon the power of the elements, infusing your ki with elemental energy and allowing your attacks to deal energy damage.

name: Shooting Stars Stance
desc: You enter a stance that lets you throw shuriken with lightning speed.

name: Stunning Fist
desc: The focused power of your flurry threatens to overwhelm your opponent.

name: Cobra Stance
desc: You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs.

name: Deflect Arrow
desc: Your reflexes allow you to deflect ranged attacks.

name: Flurry of Maneuvers
desc: You flurry is a combination of maneuvers.

name: Flying Kick
desc: You launch yourself at a foe.

name: Guarded Movement
desc: Your guard is up, even while moving.

name: Peafowl Stance
desc: You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl.

name: Sacred Ki
prerequisites: Ki Strike; you follow a deity
desc: The power of your faith suffuses your ki

name: Stand Still
desc: You strike out when your foe tries to flee.

name: Wholeness of Body
desc: You can restore your health by tapping into your ki.

name: Abundant Step
desc: You can teleport yourself a short distance.

name: Align Ki
desc: The power of your ki soothes your wounds and energizes you for battle.

name: Blazing Talon Surge
desc: You rush forward and latch onto your enemy with talons of hungering fire.

name: Crane Flutter
desc: You interpose your arm between yourself and your opponent.

name: Dragon Roar
desc: You bellow, instilling fear in your enemies.

name: Gorilla Pound
desc: You pound your chest before slamming into your foes.

name: Jellyfish Stance
desc: You relax your posture and loosen your joints, allowing yourself to move with incredible fluidity.

name: Ki Blast
desc: You can unleash an impactful cone of force by channeling your ki.

name: Mountain Stronghold
desc: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you.

name: One-Inch Punch
desc: You put all your force into a single mighty, carefully controlled blow.

name: Return Fire
desc: Snatching an arrow out of the air, you instantly put it to your bow and return fire.

name: Stumbling Feint
desc: You lash out confusingly with what seems to be a weak move but instead allows you to unleash a dangerous flurry of blows upon your unsuspecting foe.

name: Tiger Slash
desc: You make a fierce swipe with both hands.

name: Water Step
desc: You can Stride across liquid and surfaces that don’t support your weight.

name: Whirling Throw
desc: You propel your grabbed or restrained foe a great distance.

name: Wolf Drag
desc: You rip your enemy off their feet.

name: Arrow Snatching
desc: You pluck missiles from the air and hurl them back at their source.

name: Clinging Shadows Initiate
desc: You learn a mystical stance that transforms your ki into sticky smoke that shrouds your limbs, clinging to everything you touch.

name: Ironblood Stance
desc: You enter the stance of impenetrable iron, refusing to yield to any blow.

name: Mixed Maneuver
desc: You combine two different maneuvers together into a single flowing whole.

name: Pinning Fire
desc: You target your opponent's clothing, equipment, or loose flesh with piercing projectiles to pin them to the ground or a nearby surface.

name: Tangled Forest Stance
desc: You extend your arms like gnarled branches to interfere with your foes’ movements.

name: Wall Run
desc: You defy gravity, traversing vertical planes as easily as the ground.

name: Wild Winds Initiate
desc: You learn a mystical stance that lets you attack from a distance.

name: Cobra Envenom
prerequisites: Cobra Stance; expert in unarmed attacks
desc: You lash out with devious intent and the power to envenom your foe.

name: Entwined Energy Ki
desc: You can transform your inner power into a type of energy to empower your ki abilities.

name: Knockback Strike
desc: You focus your strength into a blow powerful enough to push an enemy away from you.

name: Peafowl Strut
desc: You slowly move across the battlefield with dangerous grace.

name: Prevailing Position
desc: Your willingness to flow from one stance to another lets you sacrifice their benefits to better protect yourself.

name: Sleeper Hold
desc: You pinch crucial points of your target’s nervous system, impeding its ability to function.

name: Wind Jump
desc: You gather the wind beneath you, allowing you to soar as you jump.

name: Winding Flow
desc: Any journey consists of more than simply reaching your destination.

name: Wronged Monk's Wrath
desc: You gain the wronged monk's wrath ki spell.

name: Diamond Soul
desc: You have fortified your body and mind against eldritch effects.

name: Disrupt Ki
desc: Your strike can block a creature's inner life force.

name: Dodging Roll
desc: You dodge a blow at the last possible moment.

name: Focused Shot
desc: You achieve a state of perfect calm before unleashing your attack, opening your mind to the minute movements of the world around you to increase your accuracy.

name: Improved Knockback
desc: Your shoves cause the target to go farther.

name: Meditative Focus
desc: Your meditation is so effective that you can achieve a deep focus.

name: Overwhelming Breath
desc: You control your breathing and align it with your ki, exhaling with controlled force in order to overcome your opponent's resistance.

name: Sense Ki
desc: You can read the presence of ki in your area.

name: Stance Savant (Monk)
desc: You enter a stance without a thought.

name: Explosive Death Drop
desc: You lift your enemy into the air before bringing them crashing down with a fiery detonation.

name: Form Lock
desc: Your ability to control your own ki empowers you to pressure other creatures into resuming their true forms.

name: Ironblood Surge
desc: You steel yourself, preparing to resist oncoming attacks and using your muscles to absorb the impact.

name: Mountain Quake
desc: You stomp, shaking the earth beneath you and causing quakes.

name: Shadow's Web
desc: You launch a wave of shadowy ki outward from your body, damaging your opponents and potentially binding them in place.

name: Tangled Forest Rake
desc: You reposition foes with raking attacks.

name: Timeless Body
desc: You cease aging.

name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon
desc: You have transcended the barriers between words and meaning.

name: Whirling Blade Stance
desc: You enter a mindful stance that creates a deep connection between you and your monk weapons, allowing you to manipulate them with your ki even at a distance.

name: Wild Winds Gust
desc: You store up energy and release it in an enormous gust of rushing wind.

name: Electric Counter
desc: You can charge yourself with lighting, gain resistance to electricity or shocking an attacker.

name: Enlightened Presence
desc: You exude an aura of resolve.

name: Flinging Blow
desc: You take a moment to center yourself, then unleash a powerful blow that sends your target tumbling away.

name: Master of Many Styles
desc: You move between stances in an unceasing dance.

name: Medusa's Wrath
desc: You learn a monstrous ki technique that infuses your blows with the petrifying power of a medusa's gaze.

name: One-Millimeter Punch
desc: Your punches have incredible force and control.

name: Quivering Palm
desc: Your strikes can kill foes.

name: Shattering Strike (Monk)
desc: The force of your considered blow shatters objects and defenses alike.

name: Diamond Fists
desc: Your body hardens as you combine your attacks, making your finishing blows more damaging.

name: Effortless Reach
desc: Focusing the powers of your ki to augment your blows, you stretch and lengthen your body in ways that defy logic.

name: Empty Body
desc: You transmute your body into an ethereal form.

name: Ki Center
prerequisites: ki spells; Master of Many Styles
desc: You center yourself with the universe and draw upon its vast power.

name: Ki Form
desc: You have mastered a potent technique for using your ki to reinforce your physical form and propel yourself through the air.

name: Meditative Wellspring
desc: When you clear your mind, your focus comes flowing back in a powerful rush.

name: Swift River
desc: You flow like water, avoiding all restraints.

name: Triangle Shot
desc: You string three arrows to your bow and fire them all at once.

name: Deadly Strikes
desc: You have honed your body to attack with lethal focus.

name: Endurance of the Rooted Tree
desc: Just as the Vale of Aroden retains light and life despite inhospitable surroundings, you can sustain yourself regardless of your environment.

name: Enduring Quickness
desc: You move as fast and as high as the wind itself.

name: Fuse Stance
desc: You have combined two stances into a single stance all your own.

name: Golden Body
desc: Strike harder and heal more rapidly.

name: Impossible Technique
desc: You execute a maneuver that defies possibility.

name: Vitality-Manipulating Stance
desc: You have learned to attack meridians and pressure points.

name: Glean Lore
desc: You tap into the collected lore of the divine, accessing a variety of potentially useful information.

name: Divine Aegis
desc: You summon divine energy to shield yourself, offering protection against other traditions but leaving you exposed to other divine effects.

name: Domain Acumen
desc: Every oracle's mystery touches on a divine domain of the deities that fuel it; you can access that power.

name: Bespell Weapon
desc: You siphon the residual energy from the last spell you cast into one weapon you’re wielding.

name: Divine Access
desc: Your ability to tap into divine magic surpasses the spells traditionally available to you (the divine spell list).

name: Vision of Weakness
desc: You can call upon divine insights to single out your foes' weak points.

name: Advanced Revelation
desc: You learn an advanced revelation spell associated with your mystery.

name: Spiritual Sense
desc: You have a vague connection to the Ethereal Plane that enables you to notice spirits.

name: Debilitating Dichotomy
desc: You can give others a glimpse of the impossible conflicts and unchecked power that courses through your body.

name: Read Disaster
desc: You spend 10 minutes and open yourself to the divine mysteries of the world, peering into the most sinister portents of the future.

name: Oracular Warning
desc: You have a flash of insight about impending danger related to one ally, and you can shout or gesture to warn that ally of the threat a moment before it materializes.

name: Surging Might
desc: With a complex gesture, you focus the divine power of your spell to overcome enemies' resistances.

name: Domain Fluency
desc: You command a deep understanding of the divine domains related to your mystery.

name: Greater Revelation
desc: You learn a greater revelation spell associated with your mystery.

name: Magic Sense
desc: You have a literal sixth sense for magic.

name: Forestall Curse
desc: You've learned to forestall the effects of your curse somewhat.

name: Mysterious Repertoire
desc: Your mystery holds unknowable depths of magic not always associated with the divine.

name: Diverse Mystery
desc: You have broadened your understanding of the divine and can tap into the wonders of a different mystery.

name: Portentous Spell
desc: Your spellcasting is rife with strange lights, esoteric gestures, and other captivating effects that befuddle your foes.

name: Blaze of Revelation
desc: Your mind and body can, for a short time, withstand the devastation of overdrawing your curse.

name: Divine Effusion
desc: The power of your mystery surges through you like a font of divine energy, even when your own magic dwindles.

name: Mystery Conduit
desc: The power of your mystery enables you to cast more than just revelation spells.

name: Oracular Providence
desc: Your mystery grants you access to deep reserves of truly miraculous divine power.

name: Paradoxical Mystery
desc: The truest depths of your divine mystery are fathomless and contradictory, granting you changing powers that even you can barely begin to fathom.

name: Scapegoat Parallel Self
desc: You've realized a way to manipulate the effects of your oracular curse.

name: Crossbow Ace
desc: You have a deep understanding of the crossbow.

name: Gravity Weapon
desc: Your expertise with your weapons and commitment to taking out your targets lends you magical power.

name: Heal Companion
desc: You have a deep devotion to your animal companion that enables you to magically heal their wounds.

name: Hunted Shot
desc: You take two quick shots against the one you hunt.

name: Monster Hunter
desc: You swiftly assess your prey and apply what you know.

name: Twin Takedown
desc: You swiftly attack your hunted prey with both weapons.

name: Favored Terrain
desc: You have studied a specific terrain to overcome its challenges.

name: Hunter's Aim
desc: When you focus on aiming, your attack becomes particularly accurate.

name: Magic Hide
desc: You can defend your companion in battle.

name: Monster Warden
desc: You understand how to defend yourself and others against your prey.

name: Quick Draw
desc: You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion.

name: Relentless Stalker
desc: Stay adjacent to your prey when they attempt to move away.

name: Snare Hopping
desc: You can magically move your snares around.

name: Wild Empathy
desc: You have a connection to the creatures of the natural world.

name: Animal Feature
desc: You are so connected with the animal world that you can grant yourself an animal's features and abilities.

name: Companion's Cry
desc: You can urge your companion to do its utmost.

name: Disrupt Prey
desc: Make a melee Strike against your prey.

name: Far Shot
desc: Your experience in the field has taught you how to focus your aim at a distance.

name: Favored Enemy
desc: You have studied a specific type of wild creature and can hunt it more easily.

name: Hunter's Luck
desc: Your recollection of monsters is magically enhanced by luck.

name: Running Reload
desc: You can reload your weapon on the move.

name: Scout's Warning
desc: You visually or audibly warn your allies of danger.

name: Snare Specialist
desc: You specialize in creating quick traps to obstruct your enemies on the battlefield.

name: Soothing Mist
desc: You have a connection to the healing properties of nature and can produce a magical mist to heal damage and stop burning or bleeding.

name: Additional Recollection
desc: You scan the battlefield quickly, remembering critical details about multiple opponents you face.

name: Ephemeral Tracking
desc: You are able to track your quarry through impossible places.

name: Mature Animal Companion (Ranger)
desc: Your animal companion grows up, gaining additional capabilities.

name: Quick Snares
desc: You can rig a snare in only moments.

name: Ranger's Bramble
desc: You can cause plants to grow and trap your foes with thorns.

name: Skirmish Strike
desc: Your feet and weapon move in tandem.

name: Snap Shot
desc: You’ve learned to react with ranged weapons when a creature is in close quarters.

name: Swift Tracker
desc: Your keen eyes catch signs of passage even when you’re moving.

name: Deadly Aim
desc: You aim for your prey’s weak spots, making your shot more challenging but dealing more damage if you hit.

name: Enlarge Companion
desc: You make your companion enormous.

name: Hazard Finder
desc: You have an intuitive ability to sense hazards.

name: Powerful Snares
desc: Your snares are particularly dif cult for enemies to avoid.

name: Terrain Master
desc: You adapt to your surroundings in any natural terrain.

name: Warden's Boon
desc: By pointing out vulnerabilities, you grant an ally benefits from your hunting abilities.

name: Camouflage
desc: You alter your appearance to blend in to the wilderness.

name: Hunter's Vision
desc: You are so focused on your hunted prey that you can see it clearly even beyond the limits of your senses.

name: Incredible Companion (Ranger)
desc: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop.

name: Master Monster Hunter
desc: You have a nearly encyclopedic knowledge of all creatures of the world.

name: Penetrating Shot
desc: You shoot clear through an intervening creature to hit your prey.

name: Terrain Transposition
desc: You are so connected to the wilderness that you can magically jump from place to place within it.

name: Warden's Step
desc: You can guide your allies to move quietly through the wilderness.

name: Distracting Shot
desc: The sheer power of your attacks, or the overwhelming number of them, leaves an enemy flustered.

name: Double Prey
desc: You can focus on two foes at once, hunting both of them down.

name: Lightning Snares
prerequisites: Quick Snares; Snare Specialist; master in Crafting
desc: You can rig a trap with incredible speed.

name: Second Sting
desc: You read your prey’s movements and transform them into openings, so failures with one weapon set up glancing blows with the other.

name: Side by Side (Ranger)
desc: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them of balance.

name: Warden's Focus
desc: Your connection with your surroundings grows deeper as you focus.

name: Shared Prey
desc: Hunting as a duo, you and your ally both single out your prey.

name: Stealthy Companion
desc: You’ve trained your animal companion to blend in to its surroundings.

name: Targeting Shot
desc: You carefully track your prey’s position and defenses.

name: Warden's Guidance
desc: You can convey your prey’s location to your allies, no matter how well hidden it is.

name: Greater Distracting Shot
desc: Even a single missile can throw of your enemy’s balance, and more powerful attacks leave it flustered for longer.

name: Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)
desc: You are able to riposte an additional time per turn.

name: Legendary Monster Hunter
prerequisites: Master Monster Hunter; legendary in Nature
desc: Your knowledge of monsters is so incredible that it reveals glaring flaws in your prey.

name: Specialized Companion (Ranger)
desc: Your animal companion has become cunning enough to become specialized.

name: Ubiquitous Snares
desc: You can prepare a seemingly impossible number of snares in advance, and you’re ready to spring them on unsuspecting foes.

name: Impossible Flurry
desc: You forgo precision to attack at an impossible speed.

name: Manifold Edge
desc: You’ve learned every possible edge to use against your foes.

name: Masterful Companion
desc: Your animal companion shares your incredible hunting skills, allowing it to take down your shared prey with ease.

name: Perfect Shot
desc: After watching the motions of combat with incredible intensity and precision, you fire at your prey at the perfect moment to deliver maximum pain.

name: Shadow Hunter
desc: You blend in to your surroundings so well that others have trouble telling you apart from the terrain.

name: Warden's Wellspring
desc: You command unparalleled focus when you commune with the world around you.

name: Accurate Flurry
desc: You refine the precision of your unbelievable storm of blows.

name: Impossible Snares
desc: You can create endless shorter-lived snares, protecting your lair or using them against foes.

name: Legendary Shot
prerequisites: masterful hunter; legendary in Perception; Far Shot
desc: You focus on your hunted prey, perceiving angles, air resistance, and every variable that would af ect your ranged attack.

name: Mimic Protections
