desc: By adopting resonant reflections, you have learned to copy the abilities of other creatures as well.

name: Superior Sight
desc: Increase your visual acuity.

name: Time Dilation Cascade
desc: You borrow a bit of time from the future to act now.

name: To the Ends of the Earth
desc: Your ability to track your prey has surpassed explanation, allowing you to trace your prey’s movements and predict its location with ease.

name: Triple Threat
desc: You can divide your attention three ways when hunting.

name: Ultimate Skirmisher
desc: You are so skilled at navigating the wild, your movement is completely unaffected by terrain.

name: Nimble Dodge
desc: You deftly dodge out of the way.

name: Overextending Feint
desc: When you trick a foe, instead of catching them off guard, you goad them into overextending their next attack.

name: Plant Evidence
desc: You can put a single item you're holding of light or negligible Bulk onto a person without them noticing.

name: Tumble Behind (Rogue)
desc: You tumble under and behind your foe to catch them off guard.

name: Twin Feint
desc: You make a dazzling series of attacks with both weapons, using the first attack to throw your foe of guard against a second attack at a different angle.

name: You're Next
desc: After downing a foe, you menacingly remind another foe that you’re coming after them next.

name: Brutal Beating
desc: The brutality of your critical hits shakes your foes’ confidence.

name: Clever Gambit
desc: Your battle tactics are aided by your assessment of your foes' capabilities, allowing you to instantly adjust your movements to maximum advantage.

name: Distracting Feint
desc: Your Feints are far more distracting than normal, drawing your foes’ attention and allowing you and your allies to take greater advantage.

name: Fane's Fourberie
desc: Stella Fane has perfected a technique for using playing cards as weapons that's one part sleight of hand and one part magic.

name: Minor Magic
desc: You’ve dabbled in a variety of tricks, gaining minor magical abilities from a particular tradition.

name: Mobility
desc: You move in a way that denies your enemies the opportunity to retaliate.

name: Strong Arm
desc: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, the weapon's range increment increases 10 feet.

name: Unbalancing Blow
desc: Interweaving your most powerful attacks in a graceful flow, you temporarily unbalance your foes. Whenever your Strike is a critical hit and deals damage, the target is flat-footed against your attacks until the end of your next turn.

name: Underhanded Assault
desc: You capitalize on the distraction provided by an ally.

name: Battle Assessment
desc: With careful observation during battle, you identify an enemy’s strengths and weaknesses.

name: Dread Striker
desc: You capitalize on your enemies’ fear to slip past their defenses.

name: Head Stomp
desc: Make an unarmed melee attack against a prone target.

name: Magical Trickster
desc: You can sneak spells past your foes’ defenses as easily as any blade.

name: Mug
desc: You make a quick attack and rob your foe in the process.

name: Poison Weapon
desc: You apply poison to a weapon.

name: Predictable!
desc: By observing an opponent, you can get a sense of their next move and prepare to counter or resist it.

name: Reactive Pursuit
desc: You keep pace with a retreating foe.

name: Sabotage
desc: You subtly damage others’ equipment.

name: The Harder They Fall
desc: You make your foes fall painfully when you trip them.

name: Twin Distraction
desc: Your movements with two weapons are so swift and disorienting that they befuddle your opponent.

name: Analyze Weakness
desc: Your knowledge of a creature's physiology and understanding of tactics helps you attack with pinpoint accuracy.

name: Anticipate Ambush
desc: Using your extensive knowledge of ambush tactics, you keep watch for any hidden creatures or dangerous sites, moving at half your travel speed.

name: Far Throw
desc: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, you take only a –1 penalty for each additional range increment between you and the target, rather than a –2 penalty.

name: Gang Up
desc: You and your allies harry an opponent in concert.

name: Light Step
desc: You aren’t bothered by tricky footing.

name: Shove Down
desc: You leverage your weight to topple foes that you move.

name: Slice and Swipe
desc: Steal from your target when you successfully strike them.

name: Stella's Stab and Snag
desc: You dart towards your opponent, seeking to stab them and slice their purse-strings with a single movement.

name: Twist the Knife
desc: After stabbing your opponent in a weak spot, you tear the wound open.

name: Watch Your Back
desc: You menace the target, stoking their fears and drawing their attention.

name: Ambushing Knockdown
desc: You emerge from hiding and deliver a blow that can knock an enemy sprawling to the ground.

name: Bullseye
desc: You carefully take aim before making your attack in order to avoid your foe's concealment and cover.

name: Delay Trap
desc: You can jam the workings of a trap to delay its effects.

name: Improved Poison Weapon
desc: You deliver poisons in ways that maximize their harmful effects.

name: Inspired Stratagem
desc: You quickly advise your ally, using your earlier planning to make sure luck can't throw a wrench in the cogs of your schemes.

name: Loaner Spell
prerequisites: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
desc: During your daily preparations, you can gain the assistance of an allied prepared spellcaster to prepare one spell for the day.

name: Nimble Roll
desc: You throw yourself into a roll to escape imminent danger.

name: Opportune Backstab
desc: When your enemy is hit by your ally, you capitalize upon the distraction.

name: Predictive Purchase (Rogue)
desc: You somehow manage to have just the thing for the situation.

name: Ricochet Stance (Rogue)
desc: You adopt a stance to rebound your thrown weapons toward you.

name: Sidestep
desc: You deftly step out of the way of an attack, letting the blow continue to the creature next to you.

name: Sly Striker
desc: Your attacks deal more damage, even against creatures that aren’t flat-footed.

name: Subtle Shank
desc: You draw a concealed weapon, attack with it, and then hide it away again in one smooth motion.

name: Tactical Entry
desc: Stride without triggering reactions

name: Deny Support
desc: Keep opponents from flanking when you Feint them.

name: Eldritch Debilitations
desc: You know how to apply debilitations that are particularly troublesome for spellcasters.

name: Methodical Debilitations
desc: You strategically craft your debilitations to lessen or negate an enemy's tactical advantages.

name: Precise Debilitation
desc: You carefully aim and gracefully deliver your debilitations.

name: Sneak Savant
desc: It is almost impossible to spot you without taking effort to look.

name: Tactical Debilitations
desc: You learn new debilitations that grant you tactical advantages against your foes.

name: Vicious Debilitations
desc: The debilitations you dish out seriously impair your foes.

name: Bloody Debilitations
desc: Your attacks slice arteries and veins.

name: Coordinated Distraction
desc: You distract an opponent from the fact that one of your allies is about to attack them.

name: Critical Debilitations
desc: Your debilitations are especially effective on your most powerful attacks.

name: Deadly Poison Weapon
desc: Your poisons are devastatingly potent.

name: Fantastic Leap
desc: You launch yourself through the air at a foe.

name: Felling Shot
desc: Your ranged attacks can shoot an unprepared foe right out of the air.

name: Preparation
desc: You survey the battlefield, calculating the possibilities.

name: Reactive Interference
desc: You reflexively foil an enemy’s response.

name: Ricochet Feint
desc: While in Ricochet Stance, you can bounce a thrown weapon off a foe to distract them.

name: Spring from the Shadows
desc: Leaping out from hiding, you assail your target when they least expect it.

name: Defensive Roll
desc: Dropping into a roll to disperse the force of the blow, you can partially evade a lethal attack and stay conscious.

name: Instant Opening
desc: You distract your opponent with a few choice words or a rude gesture.

name: Leave an Opening
desc: When you hit hard enough, you leave an opening so your ally can jump in on the action.

name: Stay Down!
desc: You have ways of keeping your foes down.

name: Blank Slate
desc: Your deceptions confound even the most powerful mortal divinations.

name: Cloud Step
desc: Using fantastic acrobatic skill, you can walk for brief stretches across insubstantial surfaces.

name: Cognitive Loophole
desc: You can find a loophole in a mental effect to temporarily overcome it.

name: Dispelling Slice
desc: Your sneak attack slices through the threads binding magic to a target.

name: Perfect Distraction
desc: You use clever tactics to mislead your foes as you sneak away. You Sneak while leaving a decoy behind.

name: Steal Spell
desc: When you use Legendary Thief to steal the impossible, you can steal a prepared spell or spontaneous spell from a foe.

name: Swift Elusion
desc: Attempt an Acrobatics check against the foe's Reflex DC.

name: Implausible Infiltration
desc: You find tiny holes or imperfections that no one else could see and try to somehow fit yourself through them.

name: Implausible Purchase (Rogue)
desc: Even when impossible, you always have exactly what you need.

name: Powerful Sneak
desc: You have learned to exploit your enemies’ lowered defenses.

name: Enduring Debilitation
desc: Your debilitations last for 1 minute.

name: Extradimensional Stash
desc: When you perform sleight of hand, you fold space so that objects really do disappear.

name: Hidden Paragon
desc: When you put your mind to slipping out of sight, you disappear completely.

name: Impossible Striker
desc: Your attacks are swift and deadly beyond explanation.

name: Reactive Distraction
desc: You reactively switch with your decoy to foil your foe.

name: Steal Essence
prerequisites: legendary in Thievery, master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
desc: Being in the presence of the aeon orbs as they deteriorated has taught you how to siphon energy, and you do so with the required magic item.

name: Ancestral Blood Magic
desc: The magic of your bloodline mixes with that of your ancestry.

name: Blessed Blood
prerequisites: bloodline that grants divine spells; you follow a deity
desc: Your deity’s blessings manifest in your blood-borne power

name: Counterspell
desc: When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own magic to disrupt it.

name: Dangerous Sorcery
desc: Your legacy grants you great destructive power.

name: Familiar
desc: An animal serves you and assists your spellcasting.

name: Anoint Ally
desc: You forge a mystical connection with an ally using your body as a focus, allowing them to benefit from your magic.

name: Entreat with Forebears
prerequisites: a bloodline that corresponds with a creature trait
desc: Something about your presence causes creatures of your bloodline to, consciously or not, recognize you as one of their own, and you become inured to their tricks.

name: Arcane Evolution
desc: Your arcane legacy grants you an exceptional aptitude for intellectual and academic pursuits.

name: Divine Evolution
desc: The divine might provided by your bloodline flows through you.

name: Elaborate Flourish
desc: You embellish your spellcasting with entrancing flourishes and grand pronouncements, making it harder to identify or counter.

name: Occult Evolution
desc: Glimpses of the obscure secrets of the universe loan you power.

name: Primal Evolution
desc: You can call upon the creatures of the wild for aid.

name: Split Shot
desc: You fragment a ranged spell into a pair of smaller shots.

name: Advanced Bloodline
desc: You have studied your bloodline to learn the secrets of its magic.

name: Diverting Vortex
desc: You transfer vestiges of magical energy to the air around you, creating a vortex that deflects ranged attacks.

name: Energetic Resonance
desc: Your blood resonates with magical energy, mitigating the effects of harmful spells.

name: Spell Relay
desc: You open the power in your blood to your ally's spellcasting, using your magic to boost their range.

name: Bloodline Resistance
desc: Your magical blood makes you more resistant to magic.

name: Crossblooded Evolution
desc: Odd interactions in your bloodline provide you with unexpected spells.

name: Safeguarded Spell
desc: You bring the magical wavelengths of your spell into sync with the ones produced by your own body.

name: Ancestral Mage
desc: The magic of your ancestry and bloodline are one and the same.

name: Energy Fusion
desc: You fuse two spells together, combining their energy types.

name: Energy Ward
desc: You trap energy from the last spell you cast within your body, coating your flesh in a protective ward.

name: Greater Bloodline
desc: Further communion with the legacy of your bloodline has uncovered greater secrets.

name: Signature Spell Expansion
desc: Your innate connection to magic lets you cast more spells with greater freedom.

name: Blood Component Substitution
desc: You can bypass the need for incantations and gestures by drawing energy directly from your blood, causing you to visibly glow the color of your blood and crackle with magical energy.

name: Bloodline Focus
desc: Your bloodline cause you to recover focus faster.

name: Greater Physical Evolution
desc: You hold a deep understanding of the innate fundamental structures of the physical world, and you can enforce your will upon that structure as far as your own blood is concerned.

name: Greater Spiritual Evolution
desc: Your magical blood is rich with spiritual essence, and this infusion within you allows your spells to be fully effective against incorporeal creatures, spirits, and creatures on the Ethereal Plane.

name: Consume Spell
desc: When you successfully Counterspell a spell of the tradition that matches your bloodline, you consume it, replenishing yourself with its energy.

name: Interweave Dispel
prerequisites: dispel magic in your spell repertoire
desc: You weave dispelling energy into a spell, sending both effects at a foe.

name: Reflect Spell
desc: You cause a spell to fire back at its caster.

name: Spell Shroud
desc: Your spell shrouds you in a billowing cloud.

name: Greater Mental Evolution
desc: Your bloodline’s deep connection to mental essence greatly enhances your spell repertoire.

name: Greater Vital Evolution
desc: Vital power surges through you like a font of energy.

name: Scintillating Spell
desc: Your spells become a radiant display of light and color.

name: Terraforming Spell
desc: You capture transformative fragments of magic and slam them into the ground, creating a shock wave that alters your surroundings.

name: Bloodline Wellspring
desc: Your blood’s power replenishes your focus.

name: Echoing Spell
desc: You time the components of your spell with exacting precision, setting up a resonance that duplicates the spell's effects.

name: Greater Crossblooded Evolution
desc: Your bloodline is extraordinarily complex.

name: Bloodline Conduit
desc: Your inborn magical nature lets you redirect ambient energies to fuel your spells.

name: Bloodline Metamorphosis
desc: Swap out spells from your repertoire more easily.

name: Bloodline Mutation
prerequisites: a bloodline based on a specific type of creature
desc: You permanently mutate to become more like the creatures of your bloodline.

name: Bloodline Perfection
desc: You command the ultimate powers of your bloodline and tradition.

name: Metamagic Mastery
desc: Altering your spells doesn’t take any longer than casting them normally.

name: Ruby Resurrection
desc: In a burst of flame, you return to health like a phoenix rising from the ashes.

name: Tenacious Blood Magic
desc: You have learned how to invest magic more deeply by witnessing Aroden's works.

name: Buckler Expertise
desc: You've learned a flexible way to position your buckler to provide more protection.

name: Disarming Flair
desc: It's harder for your foes to regain their grip when you knock their weapon partially out of their hands.

name: Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)
desc: You can parry attacks against you with your weapon.

name: Flying Blade
desc: You've learned to apply your flashy techniques to thrown weapons as easily as melee attacks.

name: Focused Fascination
desc: When you use Fascinating Performance in a combat encounter, you need only a success, rather than a critical success, to fascinate your target.

name: Goading Feint
desc: When you trick a foe, you can goad them into overextending their next attack.

name: One for All
desc: With precisely the right words of encouragement, you bolster an ally's efforts.

name: After You
desc: You allow your foes to make the first move in a show of incredible confidence.

name: Antagonize
desc: Your taunts and threats earn your foes ire.

name: Charmed Life
desc: When danger calls, you have a strange knack for coming out on top.

name: Finishing Follow-Through
desc: Finishing a foe maintains your swagger.

name: Tumble Behind (Swashbuckler)
desc: Your tumbling catches your foe off guard.

name: Unbalancing Finisher
desc: You attack with a flashy assault that leaves your target off balance.

name: Flamboyant Athlete
desc: Your panache allows you to perform incredible feats: climbing, swimming, and leaping far beyond your normal capacity.

name: Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)
desc: You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC against the triggering attack.

name: Impaling Finisher
desc: You stab two foes with a single thrust or bash them together with one punch.

name: Leading Dance
desc: You sweep your foe into your dance.

name: Swaggering Initiative
desc: You swagger readily into any fight—even an ambush.

name: Agile Maneuvers
desc: Your easily maneuver against your foes.

name: Combination Finisher
desc: You combine a series of attacks with a powerful finishing blow.

name: Precise Finisher
desc: Even when your foe avoids your Confident Finisher, you can still hit a vital spot.

name: Vexing Tumble
desc: You tumble around your foes, expertly avoiding their reactions.

name: Bleeding Finisher
desc: Your blow inflicts profuse bleeding.

name: Dual Finisher
desc: You split your attacks.

name: Flamboyant Cruelty
desc: You love to kick your enemies when they're down, and you look fabulous when you do.

name: Stunning Finisher
desc: You attempt a dizzying blow.

name: Vivacious Bravado
desc: Your ego swells, granting you a temporary reprieve from your pain.

name: Buckler Dance
desc: You spin your buckler defensively toward every attack.

name: Derring-Do
desc: When you compound panache with even more derring-do, it somehow tends to work out.

name: Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)
desc: Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

name: Reflexive Riposte
desc: You can riposte almost without a thought.

name: Targeting Finisher
desc: Your attack harms and hinders your foe.

name: Cheat Death
desc: Somehow you always escape the reaper by a hair's breadth.

name: Mobile Finisher
desc: You attack in motion.

name: Flamboyant Leap
desc: You stylishly leap and deliver a powerful finisher.

name: Impossible Riposte
desc: Your ripostes can deflect attacks back at their source.

name: Perfect Finisher
desc: You focus your panache into an impeccable assault.

name: Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)
desc: You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.

name: Deadly Grace
desc: Your graceful attacks are especially powerful.

name: Felicitous Riposte
desc: You take advantage of your foe's openings with uncanny odds.

name: Incredible Luck
desc: You always seem to bounce back from the worst.

name: Lethal Finisher
desc: You stab your foe in a vital organ, possibly killing them outright.

name: Parry and Riposte
desc: Your parries and finishers allow you to riposte with the slightest provocation.

name: Inexhaustible Countermoves
desc: You can react whenever a foe leaves a gap in their defenses.

name: Panache Paragon
desc: You find opportunities to perform stylish feats in the moments between others' heartbeats and eye blinks.

name: Vivacious Afterimage
desc: You move so quickly that you create a short-lived afterimage, looks exactly like you, in front of you or behind you.

name: Cackle
desc: You can extend one of your spells with a quick burst of laughter.

name: Cauldron
desc: You can use the Craft activity to create oils and potions.

name: Wortwitch
desc: You have a particular affinity for leafy plants.

name: Basic Lesson
desc: Your patron grants you a special lesson, revealing a hidden facet of its nature.

name: Conceal Spell
desc: Hiding your gestures and incantations within other speech and movement, you attempt to conceal the fact that you are casting a spell.

name: Familiar's Language
desc: You've learned to speak with your familiar and other creatures like it.

name: Living Hair
desc: You can instantly grow or shrink your hair, eyebrows, beard, or mustache by up to several feet and manipulate your hair for use as a weapon, though your control isn't fine enough for more dexterous tasks.

name: Eldritch Nails
desc: Your nails are supernaturally long and sharp.

name: Improved Familiar (Witch)
desc: You find it easy to attract a powerful and unusual familiar to your side.

name: Rites of Convocation
desc: Your patron grants you the power to summon other creatures to aid you.

name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Skillful Tresses
desc: You can expertly control your living hair and use it to perform various tasks.

name: Greater Lesson
desc: Your patron grants you greater knowledge.

name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Deadly Hair
desc: Your hair deals increased damage and can grapple.

name: Witch's Charge
desc: You forge a magical link with another creature, granting you awareness of that creature's condition and creating a conduit for spellcasting.

name: Incredible Familiar (Witch)
desc: Your familiar is imbued with even more magic than other familiars.

name: Murksight
desc: Your vision pierces through non-magical fog, mist, rain, and snow.

name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Hexed Locks
desc: Your hair attacks gain the reach trait and you can deliver hexes through it.

name: Witch's Bottle
desc: You spend 10 minutes and 1 Focus Point brewing a special potion containing the power of one of your hexes that targets a creature.

name: Major Lesson
desc: Your patron grants you even greater secrets.

name: Temporary Potions
desc: During your daily preparations, you can create a batch of two temporary oils or potions using a formula you know.

name: Witch's Communion
desc: You can keep watch over multiple charges.

name: Familiar's Eyes
desc: You use your familiar's senses as easily as your own.

name: Hex Focus
desc: Your patron's teachings have allowed you to achieve a deeper focus.

name: Rites of Transfiguration
desc: You can adapt your patron's power to transform other creatures into forms more befitting their behavior or your whims.

name: Siphon Power
desc: You draw upon the reservoir of your patron's magic that resides within your familiar.

name: Hex Wellspring
desc: Focus flows from your patron each time you commune with your familiar.

name: Split Hex
desc: You siphon some of the power from an offensive hex you cast to direct it at a second target as well.

name: Demon's Hair
desc: Your hair constantly wriggles and writhes.

name: Hex Master
desc: You embody the link to your patron so completely that you can cast your hexes in rapid succession.

name: Patron's Truth
desc: You have mastered the greatest secrets of your patron's magic and learned a fundamental truth about your patron, even if their identity still remains a mystery.

name: Witch's Hut
desc: Your home is an animated structure that obeys your commands.

name: Eschew Materials
desc: You can use clever workarounds to replicate the arcane essence of certain materials.

name: Hand of the Apprentice
desc: You can magically hurl your weapon at your foe.

name: Spellbook Prodigy
desc: You are particularly adept at learning spells to add to your spellbook.

name: Energy Ablation
desc: When you cast energy spells, you retain some of that energy as a protective barrier.

name: Nonlethal Spell
desc: You can alter offensive spells to be less deadly.

name: Call Bonded Item
desc: You're mystically connected to your bonded item and can call it to your hand.

name: Linked Focus
desc: You have linked your bonded item to the well of energy that powers your school spells.

name: Silent Spell
desc: You’ve learned how to cast many of your spells without speaking the words of power you would normally need to provide.

name: Convincing Illusion
desc: You use your deceptive skills to make your illusions seem even more real.

name: Spell Penetration
desc: You’ve studied ways of overcoming the innate magical resistance that certain powerful creatures have.

name: Split Slot
desc: You can prepare two spells in one slot, giving you the freedom to choose the spell when you cast it.

name: Advanced School Spell
desc: You gain access to a powerful new school spell depending on your arcane school.

name: Bond Conservation
desc: By carefully manipulating the arcane energies stored in your bonded item as you drain it, you can conserve just enough power to cast another, slightly weaker spell.

name: Form Retention
desc: You have trained your mind and body to tolerate polymorph magic for longer periods of time, so long as you prepare for the change appropriately.

name: Universal Versatility
prerequisites: universalist wizard; Hand of the Apprentice
desc: You can access the fundamental abilities of any school of magic.

name: Scroll Savant
desc: During your daily preparations, you can create two temporary scrolls containing arcane spells from your spellbook.

name: Clever Counterspell
desc: You creatively apply your prepared spells to counterspell a much wider variety of your opponents’ magic.

name: Diviner Sense
desc: You sense magical dangers.

name: Forcible Energy
desc: You perform complex manipulations to make the energy from your spells so powerful that your enemies remain vulnerable to it afterward.

name: Bonded Focus
desc: Your connection to your bonded item increases your focus pool.

name: Shift Spell
desc: You move an active spell's area to a new location.

name: Superior Bond
desc: When you draw upon your bonded item, you can leave a bit of energy within it for later use.

name: Spell Tinker
desc: You’ve learned to alter choices you make when casting spells on yourself.

name: Infinite Possibilities
desc: You’ve found a way to prepare a spell slot that exists in your mind as many different possibilities at once.

name: Reprepare Spell
desc: You’ve discovered how to reuse some of your spell slots over and over.

name: Second Chance Spell
desc: When your target proves resilient to your magical deceptions, you can try them again on someone else.

name: Archwizard's Might
desc: You have mastered the greatest secrets of arcane magic.

name: Reclaim Spell
desc: You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the resonant reflections.

name: Spell Combination
desc: You can merge spells, producing multiple effects with a single casting.

name: Spell Mastery
desc: You have mastered a handful of spells to such a degree that you can cast them even if you haven't prepared them in advance.

name: Worldsphere Gravity
desc: Though creating demiplanes usually requires lengthy rituals, you know how to establish minor planar effects.
